page.title: 15A CONVERSATION ABOUT MERSEA.
page.content: I talked to{Mr Mills}about Mersea eighty years ago.I asked if there were any other play areas on Mersea apart from the{Glebe.}Mr Mills said yes there was a play area near the post office.I asked Mr Mills if Mersea had changed a lot.Mr Mills said only the buildings had changed a lot in eighty years. Then I asked Mr Mills if the old mill used to have a shop outside selling what ever they used to make.Mr Mills said yes but only for a litle while.I asked if there was a water fountain then or did you have to use a well.Mr Mills said he had to use a well.
